location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Political Department letter no. 12 from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Stannus informs Newnham that he had taken charge of the Residency, Bushere [Bushire] on 4 April 1826. Lieutenant-Colonel Macdonald had arrived on 12 April 1826, and the Byramgorewith the baggage and followers of the Mission on 13 April 1826.
